name: Nutreco
goal:
Nutreco is a global leader in animal nutrition and aquafeed. Our advanced nutritional solutions are at the origin of food for millions of consumers worldwide.

Quality, innovation and sustainability are guiding principles, embedded in the Nutreco culture from research and raw material procurement to products and services for livestock farming and aquaculture. Experience across 100 years brings Nutreco a rich heritage of knowledge and expertise for building its future.

Nutreco employs over 12,000 people in 35 countries with net sales of Euro 5.6 billion in 2016. Its two global company brands Skretting (aquafeed) and Trouw Nutrition (animal nutrition) have sales in over 90 countries.

Nutreco is a wholly owned subsidiary of SHV Holdings N.V., a family-owned multinational with net sales of Euro 18.6 billion in 2016.
interests: Agriculture, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives: Feed legislation (i.e. feed additives, premixtures, compound feed), Food legislation (mainly meat, dairy, eggs & fish), Veterinary Legislation, Environmental legislation.
